title: The Demanding sea
brief_description: A record of life at sea. Two old sailors discuss their lives against a background of moving ships - frigates, tramps, liners, tankers, trawlers and tugs - and the sea, in all its moods, benign, stormy and ice-bound. Conveys an awareness of what the sea means.
